string.text: {=L2GbDVja}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the {CLAN_NAME}, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, and I am honored to serve you.
{=K5Fvv504}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, and I am honored to serve you.
{=tOanKs9o}I am {LIEGE_TITLE}.
{=bDarsOFR}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the house of {CLAN_NAME}.
{=s1FVPS5D}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has served the Empire for generations.
{=LbpdzoRd}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has stood in the Senate and discharged its duties honorably since the first days of the Empire.

{=q5nQGimE}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Though one should not be too proud of one's lineage, I am glad to say that we have always taken seriously our duty to protect the common folk of the Empire.
{=DRzsgjsD}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Empire.

{=Y8rYJaOa}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Empire. The barbarians we have slain, and the glory we have won, is second to none.
{=dC8acIya}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the {CLAN_NAME}.
{=dlkg2jQf}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, one of the ancient lineages of the Sturgians.
{=Nq2dyiO1}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, a name you will have heard many times in the sagas of the Sturgians.

{=PBgLvyOa}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. Our ancestors were among those who came from the far north to take the princes' denar and swear an oath to defend these lands, and we have held true to that oath.
{=3UucAOBW}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the {CLAN_NAME}.
{=Ua0T0A7t}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, one of the ancient lineages of the Battanians.
{=U770Bvy8}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. The fame of our family is second to none in the songs of the Battanians.
{=rhTUDKhJ}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. There's not a clan of the Battanians who hasn't contributed the skull of one of their champions to our collection of drinking cups.

{=JJAWbuNT}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. They say our ancestor was among those who came in the golden ships that came to this land from the West, in the Time of the Heroes. Of course, if you believe that everyone said to be on those boats was on those boats, they'd have capsized from the weight.
{=WH8P3Y5F}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the {CLAN_NAME}.
{=eyxfHmCU}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has served the kings of the Vlandians for generations.
{=cMO9JXvk}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We hold our lands in fief to {LIEGE_TITLE}, and we honor our oaths of fealty.
{=FFXqPFwl}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Vlandian kingdom.

{=pn79h0aj}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We received our title from the Emperor Vortios himself. Not that he had much choice about it, as he was held captive in one of our raiding ships at the time, but I'm sure he recognized the nobility of our blood.
{=l2nEIZV5}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the {CLAN_NAME}.
{=S1vGzr8z}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, a clan of the Aserai.
{=zZ9FQJRI}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, the most ancient and noble of the Aserai lineages.
{=U4p70l9B}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the {CLAN_NAME}.

{=a8584KD0}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. I am sure you have heard the name of our clan in the epics of the steppe. We carry the name of one the 12 sons of the great she-wolf, mother of the Khuzaits.
{=z2yr4mc6}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. Our clan has loyally served the Khuzait Khanate for generations.
{=62vceTar}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}.
{=HaHZss32}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, a loyal servant of {LIEGE_TITLE}.
{=hP35jSyk}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}.
{=99gE1ZoY}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {FACTION}.
{=hIFazIcK}So be it!
{=86aQkXpV}Very well - I shall put your courage to the test!
{=ry1ycxNY}I wish it hadn't come to this.
{=DIjtFVu8}Your last drop of blood? I guess I'll just have to spill it, then.
{=kkOYSCSz}Brave words are easy. We'll see what happens.
{=FbstpIYj}Don't say I didn't give you a chance.
{=N5pglyyU}Have it your way.
{=yRlINUML}Hah! I'll see you beg for mercy.
{=4Uagj1LN}Actually, I think I will keep you in captivity, as my prisoner.
{=KC7PxI8c}You are an enemy, and therefore you will remain a prisoner.
{=xjrRbZ3U}Do what you must.
{=flctCQUT}How gallant. I hope some day I may be in a position to return the favor.
{=5j6mIuu1}What? I don't understand.
{=Qb4tlTEj}But enough talking. Yield or fight![ib:warrior][if:convo_angry]
{=3PsQTf0z}I've got you cornered. Yield, or we shall attack.[ib:warrior][if:convo_aggressive]
{=MzKWlFTv}A pity you and I have to fight. Do you want to give up?[ib:warrior][if:convo_stern]
{=G8ol9sG3}It grieves me to fight you, but I must. Unless of course you wish to surrender.[ib:warrior][if:convo_stern]
{=1jUa8olQ}I don't expect you to surrender, but I'll give you the chance to do so.[ib:warrior][if:convo_stern]
{=KlQlzYdS}It's Fortune's idea of a good joke to make old friends fight. Shall we dance to her tune, or do you want to give up?[ib:warrior][if:convo_nonchalant]
{=qvwfev22}I've got you cornered. Yield or die.[ib:warrior][if:convo_aggressive]
{=MUuNmr6C}The odds are not in your favor today. You may fight us, but there is also no shame if you yield now.[ib:warrior][if:convo_thinking]
{=itfE84jd}You're outnumbered. Give up. Or don't. Death in battle is a fine thing.[ib:warrior][if:convo_bored]
{=zPbQs8Zt}I can offer you a glorious death in battle, or the hospitality of my dungeons.[ib:warrior][if:convo_mocking_teasing]
{=dKmAktt7}You cannot defeat me, and I'll teach you a painful lesson if you try. Yield![ib:warrior][if:convo_angry]
{=d2QGFdRJ}You've got no chance. Surrender or I'll gut you like a fish.[ib:warrior][if:convo_angry]
{=a55SAS18}We have the advantage of you. Yield, and you will be well-treated.[ib:warrior][if:convo_stern]
{=oW51mkNE}You may fight us, but many of your men will be killed, and you will probably lose. Yield, and spare us both the unnecessary bloodshed.[ib:warrior][if:convo_stern]
{=AZf7kPgr}You are outmatched today. Give up if not for your own sake, then think of your men![ib:warrior][if:convo_thinking]
{=3L7Rkswm}You can surrender, but I hope you don't. I'd enjoy sticking a blade into you until you squeal.[ib:warrior][if:convo_mocking_revenge]
{=f2eZL7w5}Oh, I suppose I'm obligated to give you a chance to grovel for your life. Will you surrender, then?[ib:warrior][if:convo_mocking_revenge]

{=heKSWVJk}Oh, I suppose I'm obligated to give you a chance to surrender, but I hope you don't. I'm rather looking forward to seeing how well attached your head is to your neck.[ib:warrior][if:convo_mocking_aristocratic]
{=bAir72Sf}Stop! I yield![if:convo_beaten]
{=xJ1LJ3mH}We are at your mercy.[if:convo_beaten]
{=5ZfjV7hS}Enough! You win today, you dog! Ach, the shame of it![if:convo_angry]
{=pXULuzaq}I yield! You have won. Cursed be this day![if:convo_angry]
{=WFwoWAic}I give up! I give up! Call back your dogs![if:convo_angry]
{=rCNUXFTN}I yield! Congratulations on your victory.[if:convo_beaten]
{=hQsjeTix}I yield! Grant me the honors of war, and do yourself credit![if:convo_thinking]
{=Mlpy0SQo}I give up! You fought well. There is no call for further bloodshed.[if:convo_thinking]
{=BRMngn5i}Enough! I am your prisoner. I can pay a ransom. I am worth more to you alive than dead.[if:convo_thinking]
{=YWOSDu1W}Enough! I choose to live to fight another day. I trust you will respect the custom of war, and allow me to pay a fair ransom.[if:convo_thinking]
{=nRnbBnFq}I am? Well... I am grateful.[if:convo_relaxed_happy]
{=FpD4Y9cX}Thank you. I must remain your enemy, but I am grateful nonetheless.[if:convo_relaxed_happy]
{=wrIYDx9V}I'm free? Well... Good bye, then.[if:convo_nonchalant]
{=O8wTipT2}Thank you. When you are finally defeated, I will request that your death be swift and merciful. Unless, that is, you care to join us... Good bye, for now.[if:convo_nonchalant]
{=BCfeuAX5}Am I? So refined is your cruelty, that you would rather see me free and humiliated, than in chains. Enjoy your triumph![if:convo_contemptuous]
{=sax2tF9L}You are indeed a {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} of honor, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. I shall not forget this.[if:convo_relaxed_happy]
{=vNnMHR84}You do yourself credit, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. I shall not forget this..[if:convo_relaxed_happy]
{=C5JaFsDZ}{FIRST_NAME} is my liege. That's all there is to say.
{=xH4KJEBP}I'm sworn to {?GENDER}her{?}his{\?} service. That is all there is to say.
{=SSuL62NZ}I'm loyal to {FIRST_NAME}. No one better say otherwise.
{=IuSH0tcp}{FIRST_NAME} has always fulfilled {?GENDER}her{?}his{\?} duty to me, and I intend to do the same.
{=EXgm5Utx}Long may {?GENDER}she{?}he{\?} live!
{=aaadHoIb}May {?GENDER}she{?}he{\?} crush all {?GENDER}her{?}his{\?} foes!
{=gxV3M6HH}Naturally, I wish {?GENDER}her{?}him{\?} a long life and victory over all {?GENDER}her{?}his{\?} foes. To say anything else would be treason, as I'm sure you know.
{=0etg1Q9l}I have asked many sacrifices of my men in {FIRST_NAME}'s service. I will not hear it said that their loyalty was misplaced.
{=y9bafYom}Congratulations on your victory in that tournament.
{=csxzwd17}So, you won that tournament... Well, luck always plays a part in these things, that's for sure.
{=Wec8VlAQ}Congratulations on your victory in that tournament in {TOURNAMENT_TOWN}.
{=t3FQbYU6}Your tournament victory in {TOURNAMENT_TOWN}... Well, luck always plays a part in these things, that's for sure.
{=iAKHTPlP}It was an honor to compete against you in that tournament here.
{=eHuiRxC4}How about that tournament here, eh? And to imagine those contestants thought they had a chance against me
{=kBcfMYzE}It was an honor to compete against you in that tournament in {TOURNAMENT_TOWN}.
{=eZh2qzeR}How about that tournament in {TOURNAMENT_TOWN}, eh? And to imagine those contestants thought they had a chance against me
{=w6CzYbRH}I have not seen you since that tournament here. Perhaps one of us shall have better luck next time.
{=D5SIBhjl}I'm sure you remember how {TOURNAMENT_WINNER} won that tournament here... A more undeserved victory I never saw....
{=a6EBXT6C}Yes... We were both at that tournament here, right? So disappointing... Here's hoping that scoundrel {WINNER_NAME} loses the prize in a game of dice.
{=k50ZjzZ7}I have not seen you since that tournament in {TOURNAMENT_TOWN}. Perhaps one of us shall have better luck next time.
{=aKD9kfTI}I'm sure you remember how {TOURNAMENT_WINNER} won that tournament in {TOURNAMENT_TOWN}... A more undeserved victory I never saw....
{=hQlpbksp}Yes... We were both at that tournament in {TOURNAMENT_TOWN}, right? So disappointing... Here's hoping that scoundrel {WINNER_NAME} loses the prize in a game of dice.
{=8WLSZRZc}Very well. What do you propose?
{=NmlauVxB}Mm. Go on.
{=YDjLPgi3}Hmm. You have piqued my interest. What do you have to say?
{=GO47mubj}What exactly are you proposing?
{=LYUqmf6P}I will hear you. I shall assume that you will not suggest anything dishonorable.
{=lI8rPjEd}What do you take me for? A plotter? Whatever you suggest had best be honorable.
{=w7EY8rbd}Let's change the subject.
{=z1s1qOma}I think I know what you're saying. Honor precludes me from even considering it.
{=gyCA2mZP}As I see it, we have nothing to discuss.
{=R6sTYEaz}You can't talk your way out of this.
{=gggmhjd7}I'm not sure that you can offer me anything that I would not do better simply to take.
{=49sxmwcX}Still your tongue! You'll have need of it shortly, to beg for mercy
{=cFiSjbf4}Hah! I want to fight with you
{=KMygMFj2}It is my duty to fight you
{=CN20EFDE}Unfortunately, at these odds, it would be rather foolish of me not to attack you.
{=VOExVZtX}I'm sorry. I don't relish bloodshed, but I can't let you ride away to fight another day.
{=UyIuz9dt}What happened at {VILLAGE_NAME}... Well, war is cruel.
{=267ch9fZ}That raid on {VILLAGE_NAME}... Hard on the farmers there. Well, anyway, I'm sure the {ENEMY_NAME} would have done the same to us.
{=Rs0aUNlQ}The villagers at {VILLAGE_NAME} will remember us for a long time.
{=ODa9Eikp}That raid on {VILLAGE_NAME}... Well, the poor suffer for their lords' mistakes, so they say.
{=u5b8UKaa}That raid on {VILLAGE_NAME}... Harsh, but let's hope it brings the war to a faster end.
{=oZnVxkp0}What happened at {VILLAGE_NAME}... I do not like attacking innocent villagers like that. I wish such things were not necessary.
{=ve7pKxrc}The villagers back there at {VILLAGE_NAME}... Those could have been my people...
{=7ErxFkCB}I doubt the {VILLAGE_FACTION} will like what we did back there in {VILLAGE_NAME}...
{=FYLmd2ch}You raided my tenants at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Needless to say, I am not pleased with this.
{=k6TABWrF}We have heard of your cruel deeds when you raided my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. I am responsible to protect my tenants, and if I cannot protect them, to avenge them.
{=PKzNW9do}It was a hard thing you did, when you raided my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. War is cruel, but don't make it more cruel than necessary.
{=1bxTLLAk}You raided my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Do you think me weak? Do you think you can steal from my villagers and not pay a price in blood?
{=UBtWqLDS}I hear your men raided the poor villagers of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. You should know that they're under my protection. Next time you raid a village, try not to get caught by it's owner...
{=1bxTLLAk}You raided my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Do you think me weak? Do you think you can steal from my villagers and not pay a price in blood?
{=E9B7Vrbx}You raided my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Now I've brought you to battle. Defend yourself!
{=mUa4sDgF}You raided my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Well, I'm here now to pay back what I owe you.
{=oxMlxVqd}You raided my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. You'll die for that!
{=ghawrJRK}I heard you raided {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. That's my property, you cretin. You think you can make me look weak? You'll die for this.
{=mUa4sDgF}You raided my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Well, I'm here now to pay back what I owe you.
{=x3EZDo5k}I hear you have a habit of attacking helpless villagers, like my tenants at {VILLAGE_NAME}. I think you'll find my men a tougher morsel to chew.

{=qRW6JkXM}I hear you're the one who raided my village of {SETTLEMENT_NAME} and lifted the crops and livestock. I suspect your men must have been hungry, but so are my tenants. Shall we battle for what's left?
{=jrG4UPBr}For every house of mine that you burned when your raided {SETTLEMENT_NAME}, I'm going to carve another piece from your body.
{=w1BKhf5F}You took my property when you raided {VILLAGE_NAME}, so I'm going to take your head and mount it to the first building we rebuild.

{=Z3E8MDaB}You attacked my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Oh, I won't pretend that my men would also have had a bit of fun if it was me paying a visit to your village. But as my tenants' protector, I have a certain obligation to avenge them a bit. Please don't take this personally.
{=CUfZXlOd}I shall remember your name.
{=JBZcBg9h}It's good to meet you.
{=CUfZXlOd}I shall remember your name.
{=7lWtkqHv}I'll remember your name.
{=ieVRr359}I'll mark your name.
{=7lWtkqHv}I'll remember your name.
{=1JgKFOw8}You have my allegiance.
{=PFgGnk7z}It goes without saying that you have my allegiance.
{=dD6hNymL}My lads and I... Whatever you've heard, we respect authority. We hope we can be of service.
{=ra7YMN8S}You have my allegiance. If I hear a word spoken against you, I'll cut that person's tongue out.
{=PQZfXcU1}I have heard your name. People speak of your deeds. It is good to finally meet you.
{=o2aKr8JD}I've heard your name.
{=ETxtYU6C}So... You've made quite a name for yourself...
{=EIThhVgG}I know your name. It's good to meet.
{=gBRBdsIe}I am sure someone with your reputation knows that nothing in this world is as valuable as the weight of your word. Speak truthfully with me, and I shall do the same with you.
{=bdiuV4qb}I know your name. They say you are a {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} of valor. If fate ever decrees that we cross swords, it would be an honor.
{=Ufn3916B}I've heard about you. So now we meet. I'm not one for talk, so if you have anything to tell me, say it.
{=5DCMLfp8}I have heard of you. I am not in a mood for banter, so let us dispense with the courtesies.
{=Fb7JxGKM}Yeah... I know your name. Right. I'm not one for chat, so let's skip the soup and go straight to the meat.
{=dLHsoh3f}I have heard of you. Your name strikes fear in men's hearts. That is the best kind of reputation to have. Perhaps we may have interests in common.
{=DxuuarNT}I know your name -- and from what they say about you, I'd say that many a grieving widow knows too. But that is no concern of mine.
{=dvpbyoAQ}I've heard of you. At last we meet. You sound like a good {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} to know. Let us speak together, from time to time.
{=02FaqhzI}I've heard of you. They say good things about you. Let's talk, from time to time. A friendship with someone like me can be quite profitable for someone like you.

{=xHjVl9gR}I've heard of you. At last we meet. You sound like a good {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} to know. Let us speak together, from time to time. We may be able to find arrangements that benefit us both.
{=pZj9C1yA}The Heavens will shall be done. But those who smooth the path shall be rewarded.
{=8x8kVUGX}Uphold the rights of the poor and the meek, of the widow and the orphan, and the Heavens will take note.
{=ygP56lXC}The Heavens have blessed us with their commandments, which we must uphold and ensure others uphold.
{=WVeS3Lsb}Seek not the things of this world, but thirst after the divine truth.
{=CPWbB47d}I've heard of you! I have long wanted to make your acquaintance.
{=zwRbpQJ0}I've heard of you! A pity we should meet like this.
{=HbVsATfi}I know your name. Men praise your valor. But remember that honor and compassion are also worth cultivating.
{=HwhUEZPE}Yeah... I know your name. I've got nothing against you, friend. Stay out of my business, and I'll stay out of yours.
{=2VkCAuiu}Yes... I believe I may have heard your name.
{=1Rht7WZI}I think I have heard your name. I believe you caused some trouble for us.
{=qa2xUjcT}I know your name. I can only hope that what I have heard is not true.
{=agKiYTCE}Ah yes. I believe I have heard your name. It is indeed a pleasure to meet face to face.
{=qSF2z6Wa}I have not heard of you, but you have the look of a {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} who might make something of {?PLAYER.GENDER}herself{?}himself{\?}, some day.
{=jr0XszmA}I can't say that I've heard the name, but it's good to make your acquaintance.
{=1MPxKtue}Is this important? I'm rather busy right now.
{=tA4wDLt2}I shall have my scribes make a note of your name.
{=RajD4RC1}Never heard of you.
{=kil3bT75}One thing you should know: If you cross me, you'll regret it.
{=atHFPCcK}It is good to meet you. Remember, there is no currency in this world more valuable than the weight of your word, so speak truthfully with me, and I shall do the same with you.
{=WnxA6JQl}Good to meet you. Look, one thing I value is that people keep their word, so deal straight with me and I'll deal straight with you.
{=LEZKgNEm}I've never heard of you. No doubt another vulture come to this land to grow fat on the leftovers of war.
{=xUOhJEJS}It is good to meet you. I am always looking for warriors who value courage, glory and a good name.
{=BMc3VJcf}I don't know your name. But no matter. Some say there is greater honor to found a great lineage than to be born with one.
{=dD93WVhO}The one thing about me you should know, is that I make a very good friend and you absolutely do not want me as an enemy.
{=JkHvOVlo}I shall mark down your name. Now, do not take it amiss if I do not immediately extend my hand in friendship, for the world is a treacherous place, and I have learned to be wary.
{=6acfbHiE}I shall mark down your name. But you shall have to earn my trust, stranger, for the world is a treacherous place, and these are treacherous times.
{=Xl25HtPL}It is good to know your name. If I see you at a feast, I'll know how to greet you, and if I see you in a shield wall, I'll know whom I slay.
{=auVAWUJ3}Know that if you ever cross me, you'll wind up as food for the ravens.
{=vN4spwD1}Know that if you ever cross me, you'll wind up as food for the jackals.
{=8eLXNZ7U}It is good to know who one fights.
{=brGfaXyo}I'm not sure what to make of you, except you're either very brave or very rash, or both.
{=Pg8vccKF}Never heard of you. Doubt you'll give me much trouble.
{=TzPC5L5X}I'm always looking for good fighters. If you ask about me, I suspect you'll be told that I take good care of my men.
{=JS5hKW6p}I'm not one of those who loves war for its own sake. But I still need reliable warriors who are true to their word. I will keep faith with all those who keep faith with me.
{=iM76GPzK}I will always listen to a {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} of integrity. On the other hand, if you lack that, please do not plague me with your company.
{=ufa20b2l}I'll deal with those who keep their oaths. If you're one of those who don't value their word, don't waste my time.
{=JNb6l91E}If you ever want a chance for glory, you might want to consider fighting for me. One day you can tell your grandchildren that you served under my command.
{=fHFpgitO}It is good to meet you. Always remember that while courage is commendable, compassion is the greatest of virtues.
{=xsaOxeHV}I have heard much about you. Some men may fear a woman who is versed in the art of war, but I for one will not turn away hands that can grip a sword, should their owner be brave and loyal.

{=MUHdZHFw}I have heard much about you. They say that you are the equal of even the bravest of men in your prowess at arms. Perhaps one day I shall try my valor against yours, either in a tournament or on the battlefield!
{=jxduaTUc}I've heard of talk of you -- the woman who knows how to fight like a man.
{=KkWNSw9p}I know your name. It strikes fear in men's hearts. That is good. Perhaps we should speak together, some time.
{=PhTv43ve}Ah, yes. At last we meet. You sound like a good woman to know. Let us speak together, from time to time.
{=nJgp2MoR}I know your name -- and from what I hear, I'll warrant that many a grieving widow knows too. But that is no concern of mine.
{=Wt4iJPcd}I've heard of you! It's very good to finally make your acquaintance.
{=3TGug4Vb}I know your name. They say you are a most valiant warrior. I can only hope that your honour and mercy matches your valor.
{=SJ3bpDxC}I do not recognize your banner, but clearly you are a lady of rank. Please consider me your most humble servant.
{=fbArcLAA}My lady, if you are skilled as arms as you are fair in countenance, then your enemies should indeed fear you!
{=aIimfZZe}I've heard of you. They spoke of you as an impressive warrior. They had not mentioned that you were so, em, charming.
{=JcdmntiC}Ah, yes. From what they said of you, I had imagined someone whose blade was still dripping with the blood of her enemies, not someone with your grace and charms.
{=WbAAkcbw}It's an honor to meet you, my lady.
{=QhkM71ap}It's an honor to meet you, good sir.
{=9uH1NdsT}You're a handsome devil, aren't you? Bet you're a load of trouble, though.
{=TvqjhDaQ}So, my young lion. You have the look of someone who may go far, if they don't wind up dead.
{=6l8ty6Dr}Pleasure to meet you.
{=lcPeNFTN}I am glad to meet you.
{=OgzAlCkk}I am still recovering from the bruises you gave me.
{=9ZHhYooG}Remember how I beat you, one-on-one? Are you back for more?
{=bbjLFWhP}I won our last duel, but you fought well. I wouldn't blame you if you wished for a rematch.
{=i1RXpQxR}Remember our duel? It was a good fight. But with the advantage I have now, I'm afraid I can't afford to be so sporting.
{=MSiuWF7V}We can take no more! We have raised the standard of rebellion, and will fight the people's enemies until our just demands are met.
{=te2DSMtg}We're not putting up with it any more. We will spill the blood of the oppressors and anyone who stands in the way of our just wrath.

{=s6xlGuTH}I will honor the terms of the parley if you do likewise.

{=T0Cdfsx2}You asked for a parley. If you're tempted to try any tricks, do know I have some archers standing by to keep you honest.
{=cGuzIVlk}They say you have travelled quite widely. Tell me a bit about your journeys...
{=sJNrVlXa}Heard you get around quite a bit... So... Tell me a bit about your travels, then.
{=L6FSmeIv}They say you've travelled widely. Such terrible times we live in, so much hardship. What do you think of what you've seen?
{=BbVpiTdi}You are, I hear, a man of the world, as they say. Tell me a bit about your journeys.

{=f3X79aDs}So... I've heard you've travelled around a fair bit. No doubt you've seen a lot of strange and awful things. Maybe you've done a few strange and awful things. Go on, tell me a bit about your journeys. I promise not to be shocked.
{=sEfAuErj}Some people say you will go far... Suppose you were to rise to a position of power. What would you do?
{=rndbZI9I}Now don't take this the wrong way, but some would say that you're aiming a bit beyond your station. But lets say your rise in the world. What would you do?
{=dniQq29H}I shall put this bluntly. You are not from a good family. Some would say you are setting your sights too high. But suppose you were to rise in the world. What would you do?
{=9LwkLxo7}You may be of humble birth, but you seem like the type who will rise in the world. Suppose you were to come to a position of power and responsibility. How would you use it?
{=xb5RGe0W}Thanks again for taking on that little matter for me. Best of luck.
{=o4talwN5}Thanks again for agreeing to handle that matter for me.
{=ZlA0uc8z}Thank you again for agreeing to handle that problem of mine. Best of luck with it.
{=XBbdhx4M}Again, I'm glad to have your assistance.
{=L2PFxbD3}So... Not long ago, you betrayed my trust. Do we really have anything to discuss?
{=pQkiu5qf}Would you like me to give you another task, so that you can betray me again?
{=TUwY7IKc}So... You really did me over. Not sure we have much to talk about now, after that.
{=7pQ3y21E}Thank you again for all your help.
{=27KUtWGA}You came through on that task I gave you. I thank you.
{=LkVCTVMx}I thank you for what you did for me. You kept your word. Not everyone is so dependable these days.
{=tRSD2C3k}That task you took on for me. Very nicely done.
{=A40Z3egp}That job you did for me... Nice work.
{=J0wLOV3u}I know that the task I gave you was not easy... Well, let's not speak of that anymore.
{=Gp3l5fjI}So, about that task I gave you... Well, I can only hope that you gave it your best try, and you'd said you would.
{=aFbkjgVe}So, you weren't able to complete that task... Well, sometimes these things are out of our hands... and sometimes not. But let us not dwell on this.
{=UehvSvLD}That job I gave you... I'd say you let me down.
{=pgIaAnBt}So that problem I asked you to take care of... Didn't go so well, I hear.
{=c7hrnOUE}I guess that task I gave you didn't work out.
{=HwsshsMz}I'm glad that we could come to an understanding on that recent matter.
{=qB3wfM1f}I'm glad that you and I could reach an agreement, earlier.

{=QuNcB0dA}Very well. I accept.
{=mHP7PtrJ}Eh. Good enough.
{=nLbQ8rpF}Your proposal is most acceptable.
{=yUkG588C}This is good. I'm glad that we could make this work.

{=tXnSN2ey}I guess we don't have a deal.

{=wkZzavDk}So it looks like we don't have a deal But come up with a better proposal later, and I will listen.
{=hfftfRcq}Alas, I guess we simply don't see eye-to-eye on this.

{=6YUFDgGb}It is a momentous step that I am about to take, and this makes it easier.

{=l9CJa1Do}No. That's not enough, for what you're asking me to do.
{=l9CJa1Do}No. That's not enough, for what you're asking me to do.
{=T8kAgaPd}No -- I need more than that to be sure that I am not leading my followers to their deaths.
{=eu6O20oJ}Ah, look, I'd be happy to shed my blood for your cause. But I have to look out for my kin, and for those who look to me for protection. I need more from you.
{=I67MlgYp}No... Unless you can give me more, I can't do it.

{=8GDgJCB4}If you're ever looking for stout warriors, friend, you should think about hiring the Company of the Boar. The stoutest lads in Vlandia flock to our banner. Because if you don't hire us, your enemy might.

{=bNReoRmt}If you ever find yourself in a position to hire warriors, you should consider the Legion of the Betrayed. We know what it means to honor your word and contract, as we have seen the price of breaking faith.

{=ELtT9ctL}You may know of the Skolderbroda. On the battlefield, we are second to none. We expect to be paid according to our worth, and that is not cheap, but if we take your coin, you will have our oath to honor the terms of the contract, to our death if necessary.

{=6UBdsXlo}Perhaps one day we shall see each other on a battlefield. You shall know the Ghilman by the splendor of our steeds and the shimmer of our steel. If we are on your side, you may rejoice. If we are your enemy, you may save yourself a great deal of trouble by running away before the fighting starts.
{=a5LChqbr}The common folk of these lands need someone looking after them. That's where our Brotherhood comes in. You'll hear us called bandits or robbers. Don't believe a word of it.
{=48g7K7Zi}When you walk these roads, my friend, know that nothing escapes the notice of the Hidden Hand. Lords and emperors come and go, but we remain.

{=sswCmQZ2}They call us the Lake Rats, but we prefer to be known as the free people of the marshes. No prince or boyar can make us bow our heads and scrape our knees. Know that, and we can probably get along fine.

{=U9u8Qeu4}Perhaps you've heard of the Wolfskins, traveller. We are beasts. Know that so long as we eat no cooked meat, wear no woven cloth, and sleep under no roof, we cannot be touched by the laws of men. So tread carefully with us.

{=QpBmbygb}You may have heard of us - the Eleftheroi. Our fathers were thieves and runaways and troublemakers - we won't deny it. We came here because they didn't want us anywhere else. But I'll tell you this - if the empire survives, it'll be thanks to men like us, doing the hard bloody work out here in the wild fields, not those who sleep comfortably in their beds.

{=NeUilOqh}We welcome strangers into our lands. The woods are wide, and there is game to be hunted and food to be gathered, enough for all. But there are some who come here to steal from us, to enslave us, or to tax us. Every spring, the bodies of those thieves are discovered in the thaw.

{=YayEAKaI}Perhaps you have not heard of the Jawwal. Well, when you cross the desert, far from oasis and spring, in a land that others scorn, with thorns fit only for goats and camels, then you are in our domain.

{=DLV6F3ob}Maybe you have not heard of the Karakhergit. We do venture much into the sewn lands, the corrupt lands. We bow to no Khan. We sew no grain. We keep to the old ways, out amid the great grasses.
{=caKCwoPM}The Beni Zilal are the keepers of the secret. We watch from the shadows. Make foes of us at your peril.

{=iOnsulPb}You may have heard of us. Men call us the Embers of the Flame. Generations ago, Heaven instructed us to prepare for a great cleansing of the land. Until that day, we smolder in silence. But when that day comes, our righteous wrath shall burn forth.
